title: Swapin
author: Swapin

content: Who are we?Swapin (formerly Piixpay) was founded in 2017, when we spotted the potential for crypto to improve the global payments industry, making transactions faster, safer, and cheaper.Our company offers a powerful, yet easy-to-use solution that helps individuals and businesses accept and spend crypto in a smarter way.What do we offer?Swapin is a fully regulated ultra-fast solution between Crypto and Banks. Use Bitcoin to transfer money and pay bills. Empower your business by accepting crypto.Licensed and engineered in Europe - Swapin solutions instantly convert cryptocurrencies into fiat, which is connected directly to a business bank account. Swapin handles the conversion process immediately and without a need for crypto-focused accounting or compliance - Swapin takes care of it all. Swapin‚Äôs services and solutions.Swapin‚Äôs CoinCollectorCoinCollector allows businesses and companies to issue invoices as normal with a dedicated payment link provided by Swapin that can be paid using popular cryptocurrencies. Companies, in turn, will receive fiat. Simplifying crypto adoption and avoiding complex accounting.‚úÖ Accept crypto & receive fiat instantly‚úÖ Issue invoices & salaries in crypto‚úÖ Simplify & avoid complex crypto accountingGuide to CoinCollector.InstaPayInstaPay is an innovative crypto-to-fiat solution that helps anyone send cryptocurrencies, yet the recipient‚Äôs IBAN account receives euros or British pounds in its place. With InstaPay, it is simple to send instant and easy transfers to friends and family or pay for purchases using digital assets. It allows anyone to pay for goods, services, or valuable items like jewelry, cars, real estate, and more.Web3 Wallet integration - for more convenient user experience you can connect your wallet to Swapin. Web3 wallet integration enables a 100% secure connection between popular Web3 wallets without leaving the Swapin web application to send crypto. Currently supporting: MetaMask, Ledger, Trust, Rainbow, Crypto.com, Argent, and Exodus wallets.Support for other trusted Web3 wallets in the future will include Coinbase Wallet, Binance, and Tron. Additional cold storage or hot wallets may be added in the future as the demand for Web3 wallets grows.The exchange rate is locked in for 30 mins allowing you to pay without hassle and panic. And that fiat arrives instantlyInstant, easy, and secure crypto to fiat conversions.‚úÖ Connect your crypto wallet & IBAN‚úÖ Get the best exchange rate‚úÖ Fiat arrives instantlyGuide to InstaPay. InstaFillInstaFill is an innovative solution that allows users to automatically convert personal crypto assets instantly into Euros or British pounds which arrive to a connected bank account. Using the Swapin app, users can link their crypto wallet to a connected IBAN. Each time a deposit is made to your personal crypto wallet an instant fiat transfer is made to your bank account via Swapin. It really is that simple!Working as a freelancer and receiving your salary via crypto? You can receive fiat to your bank account automatically. Set it and forget it. No need to use an exchange!Guide to InstaFill.InstaBuy ‚Äî Coming soon. Stay tuned!With Swapin you will soon be able to buy all the major cryptocurrencies (BTC, ETH, USDC and others) in seconds and receive them to any provided wallet (e.g. MetaMask).E-Com Widget E-Com is an innovative tool that lets businesses and merchants of all sizes and needs easily embed a payment widget into any online storefront or website. E-Com works as a plug-and-play tool compatible with top e-commerce platforms like WooCommerce and others. Once implemented, customers and clients can make payments in crypto, but once again, the bank account specified by the business will immediately receive fiat instead. Guide to Swapin‚Äôs E-Com Widget. Coins/Fiat currencies we operate? Swapin‚Äôs list of supported cryptocurrencies includes:Bitcoin (BTC)Ethereum (ETH)Bitcoin Cash (BCH)Litecoin (LTC)Dash (DASH)Tron (TRX)USDT ERC-20USDT TRC-20USDC ERC-20DAI ERC-20Service Coin (ESCT)Currently we support fiat settlements in EUR and GBP with more to come!Some of our partners so farAufort Gold is an online metal investing platform that recently started accepting payments via cryptocurrency by adopting Swapin‚Äôs E-com widget ‚Äì a smart payment solution for e-shops and merchants. Our E-com payment widget was integrated hassle-free into the Aufort platform, connecting their investment services to quite possibly one of the most promising audiences ‚Äì crypto holders.E-Jewels, one of the largest luxury diamond retailers in all of Europe, is leveraging Swapin‚Äôs CoinCollector technology which allows businesses to accept cryptocurrencies that are immediately converted into EUR and transferred into a merchant‚Äôs bank account without all the fuss and frustration related to accounting, and conversion rates, or regulatory compliance.Re/Max - an exciting partnership with Swapin ¬†has RE/MAX leveraging Swapin‚Äôs CoinCollector technology. Using CoinCollector, customers receive an easy-to-use crypto payment link with pre-filled information to make the experience simple. Exchanges can be fulfilled to buy residential or commercial real estate globally in a few clicks. Use cases for Private UsersFrom small bills to purchasing your first home - Swapin helps people with purchases of all sizes.Need to pay your electricity bills for the month? Use Swapin's InstaPay to easily convert crypto to fiat.In the market to purchase a house? Use Swapin's InstaPay to buy that dream home all the while saving on conversion fees.Digital nomads, Freelancers, Miners, Crypto Traders, the list goes on!Our referral program for partnersSwapin offers partners a way to drive stable earnings by introducing other companies and individuals to the Swapin platform and family of products and services. Up to a 25% revenue share is offered for some of the highest commissions in the industry!Guide to Business Partner Affiliate.What customers are saying about usCheck out what people are saying about Swapin:https://www.trustpilot.com/review/swapin.comFind us onlineTelegramTwitterLinkedInFacebookLaunch the website.By the way!
